title: An Open Letter to Bill O'Reilly: Hungry Children Unfortunately Do Exist
text:
Published By: Huffington Post Media - Today 
Dear Mr. O'Reilly, I watched the segment that you had last week about hungry children in America with Kristin Powers. I know that there has ...
